verses.verse: At that time<WH6256>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, they shall bring out<WH3318> the bones<WH6106> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and the bones<WH6106> of his princes<WH8269>, and the bones<WH6106> of the priests<WH3548>, and the bones<WH6106> of the prophets<WH5030>, and the bones<WH6106> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, out of their graves<WH6913>:

And they shall spread<WH7849> them before the sun<WH8121>, and the moon<WH3394>, and all the army<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064>, whom they have loved<WH157>, and whom they have served<WH5647>, and after<WH310> whom they have walked<WH1980>, and whom they have sought<WH1875>, and whom they have worshiped<WH7812>: they shall not be gathered<WH622>, nor be buried<WH6912>; they shall be for dung<WH1828> upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.

And death<WH4194> shall be chosen<WH977> rather than life<WH2416> by all the residue<WH7611> of them that remain<WH7604> of this evil<WH7451> family<WH4940>, which remain<WH7604> in all the places<WH4725> where I have driven<WH5080> them<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.
Moreover you shall say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH3068>; Shall they fall<WH5307>, and not arise<WH6965>? shall he turn away<WH7725>, and not return<WH7725>?
Why then is this people<WH5971> of Jerusalem<WH3389> slidden back<WH7725> by a perpetual<WH5329> backsliding<WH4878>? they hold<WH2388> fast deceit<WH8649>, they refuse<WH3985> to return<WH7725>.

I listened<WH7181> and heard<WH8085>, but they spoke not aright<WH1696>: no man<WH376> repented<WH5162> of<WH5921> his wickedness<WH7451>, saying<WH559>, What have I done<WH6213>? every one turned<WH7725> to his course<WH4794>, as the horse<WH5483> rushes<WH7857> into the battle<WH4421>.

Yes<WH2624>, the stork in the heaven<WH8064> knows<WH3045> her appointed times<WH4150>; and the turtle<WH8449> and the crane<WH5483> and the swallow<WH5693> observe<WH8104> the time<WH6256> of their coming<WH935>; but my people<WH5971> know<WH3045> not the judgment<WH4941> of the Lord<WH3068>.

How do you say<WH559>, We are wise<WH2450>, and the law<WH8451> of the Lord<WH3068> is with us<WH403>? Behold, certainly in vain<WH8267> made<WH6213> he it<WH5842>; the pen of the scribes<WH5608> is in vain<WH8267>.
The wise<WH2450> men are ashamed<WH3001>, they are dismayed<WH2865> and taken<WH3920>: behold<WH3988>, they have rejected the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>; and what wisdom is in them<WH2451>?

Therefore will I give<WH5414> their wives<WH802> unto others<WH312>, and their fields<WH7704> to them that shall inherit<WH3423> them<WH6996>: for every one from the least even unto the greatest<WH1419> is given<WH1214> to covetousness<WH1215>, from the prophet<WH5030> even unto the priest<WH3548> every one deals<WH6213> falsely<WH8267>.
For they have healed<WH7495> the hurt<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> slightly<WH7043>, saying<WH559>, Peace<WH7965>, peace<WH7965>; when there is no peace<WH7965>.

Were they ashamed<WH3001> when they had committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441>? No<WH954>, they were not at all ashamed<WH954>, neither could<WH3045> they blush<WH3637>: therefore shall they fall<WH5307> among them that fall<WH5307>: in the time<WH6256> of their visitation<WH6486> they shall be cast down<WH3782>, says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>.

I will surely<WH622> consume<WH5486> them<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>: there shall be no grapes<WH6025> on the vine<WH1612>, nor figs<WH8384> on the fig tree<WH8384>, and the leaf<WH5929> shall fade<WH5034>; and the things that I have given<WH5414> them shall pass away from them<WH5674>.

Why do we sit still<WH3427>? assemble<WH622> yourselves<WH935>, and let us enter into the fortified<WH4013> cities<WH5892>, and let us be silent<WH1826> there<WH3068>: for the Lord our God<WH430> has put us to silence<WH1826>, and given us water<WH4325> of gall<WH7219> to drink<WH8248>, because we have sinned<WH2398> against the Lord<WH3068>.
We looked<WH6960> for peace<WH7965>, but no good<WH2896> came<WH6256>; and for a time of health<WH4832>, and behold trouble<WH1205>!

The snorting<WH5170> of his horses<WH5483> was heard<WH8085> from Dan<WH1835>: the whole land<WH776> trembled<WH7493> at the sound<WH6963> of the neighing<WH4684> of his strong ones<WH47>; for they are come<WH935>, and have devoured<WH398> the land<WH776>, and all<WH4393> that is in it<WH5892>; the city, and those that live in it<WH3427>.
For<WH7971>, behold, I will send serpents<WH5175>, adders<WH6848>, among you<WH3908>, which will not be charmed, and they shall bite<WH5391> you<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>.
When I would comfort<WH4010> myself against sorrow<WH3015>, my heart<WH3820> is faint in me<WH1742>.

Behold the voice<WH6963> of the cry<WH7775> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> because of them that live in a far<WH4801> country<WH776>: Is not the Lord<WH3068> in Zion<WH6726>? is not her king<WH4428> in her<WH3707>? Why have they provoked me to anger with their engraved images<WH6456>, and with strange<WH5236> vanities<WH1892>?
The harvest<WH7105> is past<WH5674>, the summer<WH7019> is ended<WH3615>, and we are not saved<WH3467>.
For the hurt<WH7667> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> am I hurt<WH7665>; I am black<WH6937>; astonishment<WH8047> has taken hold on me<WH2388>.
Is there no balm<WH6875> in Gilead<WH1568>; is there no physician<WH7495> there<WH3588>? why then is not the health<WH724> of the daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> recovered<WH5927>?
